fields.permit_lessons: Learning the laws in regards to class A cdl drivers and gaining basic understanding of the truck. Permit test issued at the end.
fields.driving_course: Student will learn to drive a big rig truck and become familiar with handling of the truck
fields.backing_course: Student will practice backing the truck up to docking bays and in various situations
fields.pretrip_test: Student will learn to do a pre-trip inspection on the outside and inside of the truck. The license test will be taken after the end of the course.
